title: Electronic City commencement date?
content: When are classes scheduled to begin? They told me August 5, but due to KCET it might be delayed. Any chance of classes commencing after Aug 18?

comments.body:
Can you tell me when is 1st round counselling of KCET? if you know 
Just asking ðŸ˜…

Option entry and stuff should start from about 24th onwards 
If the supreme court doesnt reconduct neet or anything like that during the final hearing on 22nd
So i guess around 1st/2nd week of august mock round 
And then first round
No idea.....im not from karnataka. The dates not being announced yet is itself a sign that classes will begin late. I needed the date to book flight and hotel.
I hope it starts as late as possible as I just want to enjoy holidays
